sentences.en: And what is life like a cog in China's labor - intensive factory model ? Mr.
sentences.cn: 中国劳动力密集型工厂,类如齿轮一样的生活究竟是什么样子 呢 ?

sentences.en: COB. TAB. COG mould train technology.
sentences.cn: COB. TAB. COG模组工艺技术制作.

sentences.en: He was a small cog in a large machine.
sentences.cn: 他只是“一台大机器上的小齿轮”.

sentences.en: I began to tell Cog, but he didn't listen to me.
sentences.cn: 我试着眼高格说, 可他根本不听我的.

sentences.en: I'm just a cog in the machine of a big insurance company.
sentences.cn: 我只是一家大保险公司的小人物.

sentences.en: One cog - wheel engages with another.
sentences.cn: 一齿轮与另一齿轮啮合.

sentences.en: One of the clerks must have slipped a cog.
sentences.cn: 一定有个店员出了差错.

sentences.en: Results Cognitive function change was assessed by ADAS ? cog more accuracy than MMSE.
sentences.cn: 结果轻度AD组 的ADAS-cog 总分平均19分,中度AD组 34分,重度AD组 为46分,ADAS -cog 总分变化比MMSE总分 能更精确地反映AD患者认知功能的变化.
TAB. COG模组工艺技术制作.

sentences.en: The gamesters will palm the dice and will cog.
sentences.cn: 赌徒们藏骰子在手掌中并且要诈赌.

sentences.en: The results show that the shear strength of COF is higher than that of COG.
sentences.cn: 结果表明:COF比COG的剪切强度高.

sentences.en: The shear strength of COG and COF bonded with ACF is studied by impact test.
sentences.cn: 采用冲击试验方法研究了各向异性导电胶膜(ACF) 互连的玻璃和柔性基板上倒装芯片(COG和COF)的剪切结合强度.

sentences.en: The two cog wheels engaged and the machine started.
sentences.cn: 那两个齿轮一啮合,机器就启动了.

sentences.en: The wheel engages with the cog and turns it.
sentences.cn: 轮子咬住轮齿并带动它转动。

words.tran_cn: 作弊的；骗人的；有齿轮的

以雄榫连接；一致，吻合；掷骰子时作弊，诈骗

trans.tran_en: a wheel with small bits sticking out around the edge that fit together with the bits of another wheel as they turn in a machine
